QuestData.Title: Chains of Iron
QuestData.Description: The artifact we seek is within our grasp.$b$bBe prepared for a fight. If they truly have learned how to control gronn, this may be more difficult than I anticipated.$b$bI will join you in this battle as soon as you arrive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Captain Brak and find the Heart of the Magnaron.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes... Think of the orcs that will fall before us with this power...
